entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
